price: (48) And when they are called to [the words of] Allāh and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal].
arabic: وَإِذَا دُعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
